list_definition.definition: a machine, sometimes now electrical, for grinding coffee, pepper etc by crushing it between rough, hard surfaces
a building where grain is ground

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The farmer took his corn to the mill.

list_definition.definition: a building where certain types of things are manufactured
(usually with aboutor around) (of crowds) to move about in a disorganized way

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There’s a huge crowd of people milling around outside.
